Privacy Policy
This policy provides information on the obligations and policies of AIG Insurance Hong Kong Limited (“AIG HK”) and member companies of American International Group, Inc. (“ AIG ”) (collectively called “AIG affiliates”) in relation to the personal data collected from customers in Hong Kong and Macau (including via its websites at www.aig.com.hk, www.aigdirect.com.hk, www.travelguard.com.hk/travelwise,www.travelguard.com.hk/hkptu, www.travelguard.com.hk/travelcompass, www.aig.com.hk/macau, www.aig.com.mo and www-401.aig.com.hk/anh/csd or via AIG HK's social media sites). The policy is designed to assist you in understanding why and how AIG HK collects and uses your personal data and to whom data access or “opt-out” requests can be addressed. AIG HK reserves the right to amend this policy at any time and will place any such amendments on this website. Any change, will be effective immediately upon being posted on this website. In case of discrepancies between the English and Chinese versions of this policy, the English version shall prevail.
